subject: Pedals not connected
description_text:
Dear Simpson I’ve had my sim racing pro pedals for a few months now and I love them I’ve even purchased the brake upgrade kit but now there longer being recognised in the Simpson app and also we’re not going into game controllers it’s not being recognised their either do you have any ideas? What’s the newer controller Work the sealed one? 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi simon cryer,    Please provide your order number and pedal model. If the connection issue persists even when using a rear USB 3.0 port, press and hold the upgrade button on the control box while reconnecting the USB cable to enter upgrade mode.  Then go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware-pedals, and select the .sfu firmware file that matches your pedal model to update.

I’m am so sorry it turned out to be a usb extension I was using I have moved my system around now so I can plug them directly into the computer and they have been fine so far 
Thanks 
Simon 
Sent from my iPhone

>
